title: How Information Becomes Reality, Symbol and Meaning, Gratitude and Love
description:
How does information become reality?
Jonathan Pageau  calls symbol the meeting place of heaven and earth.
What guides our vision is value.  Without value, we won’t notice anything. There must be something that is salient and it is salient because we value it.
The source of all value is the transcendent.
The importance of gratitude.
Love is a larger way of being. It enlarges our perspective. Increases our circle.
Victor Frankl in Man’s search for Meaning says that the only way you can know another person is to love them, to love who they can be, to see their potential and your own responsibility in helping that to come about in the way you interact with them.

Gratitude is a path toward become overwhelmed by the transcendent, by the miracles of the mundane.  Te develop an appreciation for the unfolding of the moment.
What role does God play in our consciousness.  Who we choose to go down the path of 
Vision, we’re aligning with God.
In some sense, we are intended to be symbols of God, His image bearers to unfold His truth to the world.
Imagination leads to ideation leads to action.  Imagination must be embodied to become reality.
God is loving us into existence, seeing our potential, giving us agency to make choices.
In our story, we are loved by the author.  In some stories, it is obvious that the writer does not love the characters but only uses them for his own purpose, to create dramatic tension or to be a foil for jokes, but there is no life in such characters and they are not compelling.  We form long running attachments to characters who seem to have a life of their own and can grow and change over time - where it can be seen that the writer has an affection for the characters, flawed though they may be (The Office, Parks and Rec)
Learning to see symbolically is a mode of perception.
Barfield - words can have souls that contain within them the built-up meaning of history.

Other videos with Michael and Alex at The Meaning Code channel:
https://youtu.be/pgeWyufs_Jg
https://youtu.be/L3qv60M_Bf4
https://youtu.be/YB53BXXmWqk
https://youtu.be/gbmm3l9HP4Q
https://youtu.be/wiBdrgaJDdQ
https://youtu.be/49yR5Jj04Sc
https://youtu.be/YttxOqlLLaQ
